revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) [32].;Kastor, son of Sisois, grandson of Petheus, mother Thaisas, drachmas 4;;Apitas, son of Chairemon, grandson of Apitas, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 16;;Ptolemaios, son of Hieronouphis, grandson of Demas, mother Ptolema, drachmas 24;;Onnophris, son of Onnophris, grandson of Sambas, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Petheus, son of Pakysis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tamaron, drachmas 4;;Ammonous, daughter of Heras, through Isidora (Chalaleis);;orchard taxes for the 12th year: apomoira drachma 1, obol 0.5, tax on produce of olives obol 1, chalki 2, naubion obols 0.5, chalki 2, surcharges obols 2;;eparourion obols 5, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 2, obols 5.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 3, obols 0.5, chalki 2, surcharges chalki 2, in total drachmas 3, obols 2;;Leontarous, daughter of Heron (granddaughter of Xiphis);;orchard taxes for the 12th year: apomoira, drachma 1, obols 4, tax on produce from olives obol 1, chalki 2, naubion obol 1, surcharges obols 2.5, chalki 2;;eparourion, drachma 1.5, chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5, chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 3, obols 5, chalki 2;;in total for the day drachmas 264, obols 26;;(Phamenoth) 24 likewise:;Heraklas, fatherless, mother Taonnophris, drachmas 8;;Sexestia, daughter of Ammonous (granddaughter of Thankioukis);orchard taxes for the 12th year: apomoira drachmas 3, obols 2, tax on the produce of oil obols 3, chalki 2, naubion obols 2, surcharges obols 5;;eparourion drachmas 2, obol 1.5, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 1;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 8, obols 2, surcharges obols 3.5, in total drachmas 8, obols 5.5; ;Ptolemaios, son of Sokmenis, grandson of Pausis, mother Tkames, drachmas 12;;Anchophis, son of Horos, cultivator in the 94th cleruchy;;orchard taxes for the 12th year in the administrative district of Psenarpsenis;;apomoira drachmas 5, obols 3, tax on the produce of oil drachma 1, obol 1.5, chalki 2;;naubion obols 3.5, surcharges drachma 1, obols 3, eparourion drachmas 3, obols 3.5, chalki 2, surcharges obols 2, kollybos obol 1.5, in total drachmas 13, obol 0.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 13, obols 4, chalki 2, surcharges obols 5, chalki 2, in total drachmas 14, obols 3.5;;Gaius Julius Maximus (son of Samarites);;orchard taxes for the 12th year: apomoira drachmas 2, obols 3, tax on produce of oil obols 2, chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 3.5, chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1, obols 3, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5, chalki 2, in total drachmas 5, obols 4, chalki 2;;naubion of the katoikoi for the 13th year obols 2.5, chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 3.5;;Gaius Valerius Martialis (? Theabennis);;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachma 1, surcharges obol 0.5, chlaki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1, obol 1;;Sisois, son of Marcus Sempronius Valens, mother Aunchis, drachmas 20, copper drachmas: drachmas 20;;Didymos, son of Petheus, grandson of Heraklas, mother Eserempis, drachmas 8;;Sabeinos, brother with the same mother, drachmas 8;;Apynchis, son of Sarapion, grandson of Euhemeros, mother Thaisas, drachmas 12;;Satabous, son of Phaesis, grandson of Sarapion, mother Philoumene, drachmas 24;;Didymos, son of Satabous, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tanomgeus, drachmas 4, copper drachmas: drachmas 4;;Sarapion, son of Valerios, grandson of Sarapion, mother Stotoetis, drachmas 4;;Ninis, son of Asklas, grandson of Ninis, mother Tabous, drachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Herieus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tremenesis, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Harmiysis, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 4;;Ptolemaios, son of Agathos Daimon, grandson of Petheus, mother Stiynchis, drachmas 4;;Phaesis, son of Phaesis through Taieous (son of Pabetas, from Sebenyttos);;orchard taxes for the 12th year: apomoira drachma 1, obol 1, tax on the produce of oil obol 1, chalki 2, naubion obol 0.5, chalki 2, surcharges obols 2;;eparourion obols 5, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 2, obols 5.5;;(in left margin: drachmas 4, obols 28) geometria for the 12th year drachmas 3, obol 0.5, chalki 2, surcharges obol 1, chalki 2, in total drachmas 3, obols 2;;naubion of the katoikoi for the 13th year obols 2, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 2.5;;in total for the day drachmas 184, obols 16."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
